content: I'll be OK for the next couple of weeks at least and will try to take time out during devdays and the week following to chair...
Actually, I lied. I'll be there tomorrow, just not the rest of the month. We can discuss whether we need to meet the week of Dev Days.
I'm in Perth, so my timezone may not be friendly with joining tomorrow.
I won't be able to make next week's meeting --day job conflict.
